728748f-a.title: Richmond: Clove Road - Disosway Place
728748f-a.text:
429 Clove Road, at the head of Disosway Place. The maps of
1874 to 1907 show it to have been the Disosway House. It was, according
to P. L. Sperr, the Adler residence at the date of the photograph.
May 16, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728748f-a.folder: Clove Road & Disosway Place, Staten Island, NY
